    "primaryLanguage": "english",
    "welcomeMessage": "
Welcome to Mentor Lab, your gateway to limitless learning opportunities! We're excited to have you on board as part of our growing community of learners and mentors. Whether you're here to acquire new skills, deepen your expertise, or explore new passions, our platform offers a wide range of courses and resources tailored just for you. Get ready to embark on an enriching learning journey with expert instructors, flexible learning options, and a seamless user experience. At Mentor Lab, growth never stops – let's achieve great things together!",
    "objectives": "Here are 30 words for Figma, separated by commas:

collaboration,design,prototyping,vector,graphics,interface,experience,real-time,feedback,components,design-systems,plugins,cloud-based,sharing,iteration,wireframing,animations,styles,assets,exporting,importing,accessibility,teamwork,editing,commenting,interaction,design-tools,layouts,templates,usability,visualization",
    "category": "software-engineering",
    "banner": "https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/mentorlab-9db1b.appspot.com/o/Screenshot%202024-10-09%20at%202.42.23%E2%80%AFPM.png?alt=media&token=e5583567-7a88-4e64-afdc-e16a9fb4e343",
    "subtitle": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Saepe culpa aut vero distinctio dolorum dicta quam quae, accusamus optio ea, similique provident repellendus repellat. Quod numquam dicta, at voluptate omnis incidunt repellat voluptatem fugiat ipsam. Sint reiciendis laboriosam odit fuga enim? Optio ipsam accusamus quia magni enim laborum explicabo a.",
    "title": "Figma ",
    "description": "Figma is a cloud-based design tool that enables teams to create, collaborate on, and share user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) designs in real-time. Known for its intuitive interface and powerful features, Figma streamlines the design process, making it easier for designers, developers, and stakeholders to work together seamlessly.

Key features of Figma include:

- **Collaborative Design**: Multiple users can work on a project simultaneously, allowing for instant feedback and iterative improvements.
- **Vector Graphics Editing**: Figma provides robust vector editing tools, enabling designers to create scalable graphics and complex shapes with precision.
- **Prototyping**: Users can create interactive prototypes that simulate user interactions, helping to visualize the user journey and gather feedback before development.
- **Design Systems**: Figma supports the creation of design systems with reusable components, styles, and assets, ensuring consistency across projects and teams.
- **Plugins and Integrations**: Figma offers a wide range of plugins and integrations with other tools, enhancing its functionality and allowing for customized workflows.

Figma is widely used in web and app design, making it an essential tool for design teams seeking to improve collaboration, speed up workflows, and create high-quality designs that align with user needs. Its accessibility across devices and platforms further strengthens its appeal in the modern design landscape.",
    "level": "beginner",
    "pricing": "0",
    "curriculum": [
      {
        "title": "introduction",
        "id": "11fc6787-ed4c-4d54-bbc6-08a0910b6ae4",
        "description": "Figma is where teams design together. Bring ideas to life in a design, wireframe, or prototype. Partner with teammates from content creation to design implementation. Get better feedback from your stakeholders. Figma gets everyone on the same page—literally.",
        "fileData": {
          "url": "https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/mentorlab-9db1b.appspot.com/o/Screenshot%202024-10-09%20at%202.42.23%E2%80%AFPM.png?alt=media&token=e86f223f-2a70-4918-9308-f622eefee5a6",
          "type": "png"

        "description": "In this series, we walk you through Figma fundamentals while building an app. This video will cover wireframing and exploring ideas.

12:00 Constraints

13:48 Iterations and feedback
15:28 In the next video...
